name: LeptospirosisTestsForLeptospiraByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Leptospira),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Leptospira culture and isolate;   

LOINC search:  leptospira (culture OR isolate) -milk),(Exclusion Criteria: milk)
